description: This classic Italian chicken piccata is zingy and delicious with a rich lemon and caper butter sauce.
name: Chicken Piccata Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the rest of the butter and once melted, add the chicken back into the pan. Cook for 3 minutes, turning once to coat both sides. Serve with fresh parsley on top and mashed potatoes on the side, if desired.
